# 云上安全产品实战手册

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce
yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce
yunshang-anquan-chanpin-shizhan-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
